atk-abh03a54:1_0: 1. Vedanāttike tisso vedanā rūpaṁ nibbānanti ime dhammā na labbhanti, tasmā ekaṁ
atk-abh03a54:1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhātiādi vuttaṁ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāyāti sahetukapaṭisandhivasena
atk-abh03a54:1_2: vuttaṁ. Dukkhavedanā paṭisandhiyaṁ na labbhatīti dutiyavāre paṭisandhiggahaṇaṁ na
atk-abh03a54:1_3: kataṁ. Tatiyavāre paṭisandhikkhaṇeti sahetukapaṭisandhivasena vuttaṁ. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a54:1_4: ito paresu ca paccayesu yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Sabbattha tayo tayo vārā vuttā. Tena
atk-abh03a54:2_0: 6. Paccayasaṁsandane pana sahetukāya vipākadukkhavedanāya abhāvato hetumūlakanaye
atk-abh03a54:2_1: vipāke dveti vuttaṁ. Adhipatiādīhi saddhiṁ saṁsandanesupi vipāke dveyeva. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a54:2_2: Vipāke dukkhavedanāya adhipatijhānamaggānaṁ abhāvato. Yehi ca saddhiṁ saṁsandane
atk-abh03a54:2_3: vipāke dve vārā labbhanti, vipākena saddhiṁ saṁsandane tesupi dveyeva.
atk-abh03a54:3_0: 10. Paccanīye napurejāte āruppe ca paṭisandhiyañca dukkhavedanāya abhāvato dve vārā
atk-abh03a54:3_1: āgatā. Navippayuttepi āruppe dukkhābhāvato dveyeva. Sabbaarūpadhammapariggāhakā pana
atk-abh03a54:3_2: sahajātādayo paccayā imasmiṁ paccanīyavāre parihāyanti. Kasmā? Vedanāsampayuttassa
atk-abh03a54:3_3: dhammassa vedanāsampayuttaṁ paṭicca sahajātādīhi vinā anuppattito pacchājātapaccayañca vināva uppattito.
atk-abh03a54:4_0: 17. Paccayasaṁsandane pana napurejāte ekanti āruppe paṭisandhiyañca ahetukādukkhamasukhavedanāsampayuttaṁ
atk-abh03a54:4_1: sandhāya vuttaṁ. Nakamme dveti ahetukakiriyasampayuttacetanāvasena vuttaṁ. Sukhāya
atk-abh03a54:4_2: hi adukkhamasukhāya ca vedanāya sampayutte dhamme paṭicca tāhi vedanāhi sampayuttā
atk-abh03a54:4_3: ahetukakiriyacetanā uppajjanti. Nahetupaccayā navipākepi eseva nayo. Navippayutte
atk-abh03a54:4_4: ekanti āruppe āvajjanavasena vuttaṁ. Iminā upāyena sabbasaṁsandanesu gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a54:5_0: 25-37. Anulomapaccanīye paccanīye laddhapaccayā eva paccanīyato tiṭṭhanti. Paccanīyānulome
atk-abh03a54:5_1: sabbā rūpadhammapariggāhakā sahajātādayo anulomatova tiṭṭhanti, na paccanīyato. Ahetukassa
atk-abh03a54:5_2: pana cittuppādassa adhipati natthīti adhipatipaccayo anulomato na tiṭṭhati. Paṭiccavārādīsu
atk-abh03a54:5_3: pana pacchājāto anulomato na labbhatiyevāti parihīno. Ye cettha anulomato labbhanti,
atk-abh03a54:5_4: te paccanīyato labbhamānehi saddhiṁ parivattetvāpi yojitāyeva. Tesu tīṇi dve ekanti
atk-abh03a54:5_5: tayova vāraparicchedā, te sabbattha yathānurūpaṁ sallakkhetabbā. Yo cāyaṁ paṭiccavāre
atk-abh03a54:6: 38. Pañhāvāre pana sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānanti tena saddhiṁ sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ tehiyeva vā hetūhi sukhavedanādīhi vā.
atk-abh03a54:7_0: 39.Vippaṭisārissāti dānādīsu tāva ‘‘kasmā mayā idaṁ kataṁ, duṭṭhu me kataṁ, akataṁ
atk-abh03a54:7_1: seyyo siyā’’ti evaṁ vippaṭisārissa. Jhānaparihāniyaṁ pana ‘‘parihīnaṁ me jhānaṁ,
atk-abh03a54:7_2: mahājāniyo vatamhī’’ti evaṁ vippaṭisārissa. Moho uppajjatīti dosasampayuttamoho.
atk-abh03a54:8_0: 45.Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa
atk-abh03a54:8_2: tadārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassa vā. Ubhayampi hetaṁ kusalākusalajavanato vuṭṭhitattā vuṭṭhānanti
atk-abh03a54:8_3: vuccati. Kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassāti phalacittaṁ
atk-abh03a54:8_4: bhavaṅgassa. Bhavaṅgena hi phalato vuṭṭhito nāma hoti. Parato ‘‘vuṭṭhāna’’nti āgataṭṭhānesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a54:9_0: 46.Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhāti domanassasampayuttā akusalā khandhā. Adukkhamasukhāya
atk-abh03a54:9_1: vedanāya sampayuttassa vuṭṭhānassāti tadārammaṇasaṅkhātassa āgantukabhavaṅgassa vā
atk-abh03a54:9_2: upekkhāsampayuttamūlabhavaṅgassa vā. Sace pana somanassasahagataṁ mūlabhavaṅgaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a54:9_3: tadārammaṇassa ca uppattikāraṇaṁ na hoti, javanassa ārammaṇato aññasmimpi ārammaṇe
atk-abh03a54:9_4: adukkhamasukhavedanaṁ akusalavipākaṁ uppajjateva. Tampi hi javanato vuṭṭhitattā vuṭṭhānanti
atk-abh03a54:9_5: vuccati. Sahajātapaccayādiniddesā uttānatthāyeva. Nahettha kiñci atthi, yaṁ na sakkā
atk-abh03a54:9_6: siyā heṭṭhā vuttanayena vedetuṁ, tasmā sādhukaṁ upalakkhetabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a54:10_0: 62. Idāni yasmiṁ yasmiṁ paccaye ye ye vārā laddhā, sabbe te saṅkhipitvā gaṇanāya
atk-abh03a54:10_1: dassetuṁ hetuyā tīṇītiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha sabbāni tīṇi suddhānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ padānaṁ vasena
atk-abh03a54:10_2: veditabbāni. Ārammaṇe nava ekamūlakekāvasānāni. Adhipatiyā pañca sahajātādhipativasena
atk-abh03a54:10_3: amissāni tīṇi, ārammaṇādhipativasena ca ‘‘sukhāya sampayutto sukhāya sampayuttassa,
atk-abh03a54:10_4: adukkhamasukhāya sampayutto adukkhamasukhāya sampayuttassā’’ti dve, tāni na gaṇetabbāni.
atk-abh03a54:10_5: Sukhāya pana sampayutto adukkhamasukhāya, adukkhamasukhāya sampayutto sukhāyāti imāni
atk-abh03a54:10_6: dve gaṇetabbānīti evaṁ pañca. Anantarasamanantaresu sattāti sukhā dvinnaṁ, tathā
atk-abh03a54:10_7: dukkhā, adukkhamasukhā tiṇṇampīti evaṁ satta. Upanissaye navāti sukhasampayutto sukhasampayuttassa
atk-abh03a54:10_12: evaṁ nava. Paccayabhedato panettha pakatūpanissayā nava, anantarūpanissayā satta,
atk-abh03a54:10_13: ārammaṇūpanissayā cattāroti vīsati upanissayā. Purejātapacchājātā panettha chijjanti.
atk-abh03a54:10_14: Na hi purejātā pacchājātā vā arūpadhammā arūpadhammānaṁ paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a54:11_0: Kammeaṭṭhāti sukhasampayutto sukhasampayuttassa dvidhāpi, dukkhasampayuttassa nānākkhaṇikatova
atk-abh03a54:11_1: tathā itarassa. Dukkhasampayutto dukkhasampayuttassa dvidhāpi, sukhasampayuttassa
atk-abh03a54:11_3: dvidhāpi, itaresaṁ nānākkhaṇikatoti evaṁ aṭṭha. Paccayabhedato panettha nānākkhaṇikā
atk-abh03a54:11_4: aṭṭha, sahajātā tīṇīti ekādasa kammapaccayā. Yathā ca purejātapacchājātā, evaṁ vippayuttapaccayopettha
atk-abh03a54:11_5: chijjati. Arūpadhammā hi arūpadhammānaṁ vippayuttapaccayo na honti. Natthivigatesu
atk-abh03a54:11_6: satta anantarasadisāva. Evamettha tīṇi pañca satta aṭṭha navāti pañca gaṇanaparicchedā.
atk-abh03a54:11_7: Tesaṁ vasena paccayasaṁsandane ūnataragaṇanena saddhiṁ saṁsandanesu atirekañca alabbhamānañca
atk-abh03a54:12_0: 63-64. Hetuyā saddhiṁ ārammaṇaṁ na labbhati, tathā anantarādayo. Adhipatiyā dveti
atk-abh03a54:12_1: dukkhapadaṁ ṭhapetvā sesāni dve. Dukkhasampayutto hi hetu adhipati nāma natthi, tasmā
atk-abh03a54:12_2: so na labbhatīti apanīto. Sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. Iti hetumūlake dveyeva gaṇanaparicchedā,
atk-abh03a54:12_3: tesaṁ vasena cha ghaṭanāni vuttāni. Tesu paṭhamaṁ avipākabhūtānaṁ ñāṇavippayuttanirādhipatidhammānaṁ
atk-abh03a54:12_4: vasena vuttaṁ, dutiyaṁ tesaññeva vipākabhūtānaṁ, tatiyacatutthāni tesaññeva ñāṇasampayuttānaṁ,
atk-abh03a54:12_6: Paṭhamaṁ vā sabbahetuvasena, dutiyaṁ sabbavipākahetuvasena, tatiyaṁ sabbāmohahetuvasena,
atk-abh03a54:13_0: 66. Ārammaṇamūlake adhipatiyā cattārīti ārammaṇādhipativasena sukhaṁ sukhassa, adukkhamasukhassa,
atk-abh03a54:13_1: adukkhamasukhaṁ adukkhamasukhassa, sukhassāti evaṁ cattāri. Upanissayepi ārammaṇūpanissayavasena
atk-abh03a54:13_2: cattāro vuttā. Ghaṭanāni panettha ekameva. Adhipatimūlakādīsupi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a54:13_3: yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati, taṁ sabbaṁ sādhukaṁ sallakkhetvā saṁsandanaghaṭanagaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a54:14_0: 83-87. Paccanīyamhi kusalattike vuttanayeneva anulomato paccaye uddharitvā tattha
atk-abh03a54:14_1: laddhānaṁ vārānaṁ vasena paccanīyato gaṇanavasena nahetuyā navāti sabbapaccayesu
atk-abh03a54:14_2: nava vārā dassitā . Te ekamūlakekāvasānānaṁ navannaṁ vissajjanānaṁ vasena ‘‘sukhāya
atk-abh03a54:14_3: vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa nahetupaccayena
atk-abh03a54:14_4: paccayo, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṁ datvā’’tiādinā nayena pāḷiṁ
atk-abh03a54:14_5: uddharitvā dassetabbā. Paccayasaṁsandane panettha nahetupaccayā…pe… naupanissaye
atk-abh03a54:14_6: aṭṭhāti nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayavasena veditabbā. Dubbalakammañhi vipākassa na upanissayo
atk-abh03a54:14_7: hoti. Kevalaṁ pana nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayeneva paccayo hoti. Sesamettha anulomapaccanīyapaccanīyānulomesu
atk-abh03a54:14_8: ca tesaṁ tesaṁ paccayānaṁ yoge laddhavāravasena sakkā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva gaṇetuṁ,
